page.title: 15THE CHANGING FACE OF SNAITH
page.content: Snaith is designated as a development area. There has been a great deal of new housing within the last twenty years. The Saffron Estate was build on a site known locally as the Showfield. It was here that the local agricultural show, Snaith Show, was held. It is now held at the village of Gowdall. Development is currently taking place next to the church on the Priory Site. As the centre of Snaith contains so many listed buildings there is only a limited scope for commercial development. Recent additions to shopping facilities have included a cycle shop, a video rental shop, a Chinese Takeaway and an Estate Agents. A Brewery has recently opened in Mill Street and trades under the name of the Old Mill Brewery. (Real Ale)
